Facebook Trivia Night!

Nov 16, 2010

Facebook know-it-all?
PROVE IT!

Join us for a fun filled night of pub style trivia about Facebook, Princeton and computer science. FREE FOOD and over $500 in PRIZES awarded.

Plan a Team of 4 or form a team at the event! Show off your smarts!

Wednesday, November 17
6:30-8:30pm
Friend Center Convocation Room

Link to FB event: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=117896248273267&index=1
